message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $14,000. What do you think?
I really like the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,500. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle at $13,000?
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, Bob. While $13,000 is a fair offer, the value of this product is truly exceptional.  Could we agree on $13,750? This feels like a fair compromise.
I understand that the product has exceptional value, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go above $13,000. Would you be willing to meet me at $13,000, or is there some flexibility to go even lower?
